channel.title: How do i make staff only places?
channel.description: Alright i need to figre out how to code like mod only,admin only places for my server! please help? =] And i mean like pleaces were mod+ or admin+ can enter.

item.title: How do i make staff only places?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:6, topic:263209”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=347662.msg2676323#msg2676323 date=1235089295]

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminzone") && playerRights > 0) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; }

Or, there is a tutorial on limiting who enters an area.

But I don’t think that tutorial works well, since it might glitch the player update.
[/quote]

In my tut, all it does is act like a teleport as if you were to do ::home or something. But instead of typing it, it’s activated by walking into an area.[/quote]
Really? Well, I think it might affect the player update, since you are only being teleported away when you step into that area. I might be wrong though.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make staff only places?

item.title: How do i make staff only places?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:4, topic:263209”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=347662.msg2676322#msg2676322 date=1235089236]

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminzone") && playerRights > 0) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; }

Or, there is a tutorial on limiting who enters an area.
[/quote]
But I don’t think that tutorial works well, since it might glitch the player update.[/quote]

In my tut, all it does is act like a teleport as if you were to do ::home or something. But instead of typing it, it’s activated by walking into an area.
